directions: Put lukewarm water, milk powder, salt, brown sugar, molasses, butter, whole wheat flour, bread flour, rye flour, caraway seeds, and yeast into the pan of a bread machine in the order suggested by the manufacturer. Select the Grain setting and 2-pound loaf size.
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups lukewarm water (100 degrees F/38 degrees C)
title: Caraway Rye Bread (for the bread machine)
